data.Description: My role was to be the main point of contact between clients, clinics and other parties participating in the study
I mainly provided administrative support to the Clinical Research Associates, maintaining the clinical trial master file and distributing study material to the clinics.
Worked with collecting and organizing orders for grocery store chains.
A 2 year programme with C# and the Microsoft .NET plattform as a vantage point. From there the students learn to work with databases, serverside programming, frontend and backend development.

The programme was focused on understanding disease mechanisms at a molecular level, particularly for the most common and widespread diseases, with the aim of developing future methods for the diagnosis and treatment of these diseases.
